northStar: Provide fast, accurate, and safe assistance to the user while maintaining perfect repository hygiene.
principles: Keep the user informed of my actions.
Always use kebab-case for slugs, IDs, and file names.
Automation: use Swift-based launchpad/scratch tools (SPM) and avoid Python for repository automation.
risks: Intent Drift: Misinterpreting user intent could lead to incorrect actions. Mitigate by asking clarifying questions.
